issue.title: [CF 832] Shield Block showing as Unusable
issue.body:
^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SStackMin^N1 ^SStackAlpha^N0.6 ^SName^SShield~`Block ^SManaCheck^B ^SPBarOffs^S0 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SShowPBar^B ^SShowWhen^N3 ^SUnAlpha^N0.6 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N62102^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Get max rage (120)
2. Have 2 charges on Shield Block
3. Use Shield Block

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expect to see the icon with full Opacity, since I still have 1 charge left and 60 rage. Instead, it shows as Unusable (60% Opacity)

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.2.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Zhurk | Imported from CurseForge issue #832 | Raw

comments.body:
I am not seeing this behavior. When I reach 120 rage and cast shield block once, the icon's color changes to the proper color for a cooldown icon that has an active timer on it that is not shown (configured in TMW's color options), but its opacity is staying at 100%.
